name: DailySignal
text:
As tumultuous as our system may seem to the outside world, it gives us the best chance to beat COVID-19 and escape encroaching tyranny at the same time.

@JarrettStepman explains how stopping petty tyrannies is how we beat the serious ones: https://t.co/LbKTNTYuli

name: DailySignal
text: States that are restricting in-person religious services more aggressively than other, similarly situated in-person gatherings are acting unconstitutionally. https://t.co/8BtbMjg5w2

name: DailySignal
text:

text: The ensuing left/right, liberal/conservative, Democrat/Republican divide not only intensified in the 21st century, it also took on a dangerous geographical separatism. https://t.co/2QQqXQtd5U

name: DailySignal
text: Today Amazon shareholders defeated a resolution that would have curbed the Southern Poverty Law Center's power to decide what charities customers can contribute to via purchases made through the nation’s largest retailer. https://t.co/MGycyhm0R0
